bug.author: radiodee1
bug.summary: serialization problem with cuda vs cpu
bug.description: different backends should serialize transparently. This error was found after switching from cpu to cuda on the rc3.9 snapshot. <denchmark-link:https://gist.github.com/radiodee1/f4b66de4f0b437c49de5>https://gist.github.com/radiodee1/f4b66de4f0b437c49de5</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
